name: Tile Climb
description:
Match gems to raise tiles and outclimb the relentless flood.

Made for a monthly 24 hour jam (but really more like 10 hours).

Notably missing win/lose states, but it's coming along.

Tons of credit to Catlike Coding for the bulk of the hex map mesh generation. http://catlikecoding.com/ .  Support that man on Patreon!
